McGill University (MCGILL) Transcript: How to Submit

Application for admission into the McGill University (MCGILL) 2024 is open for online application from January to Mayember 2024. The application deadline covers the winter, Fall, and Spring admission for the 2024 academic year. Students aspiring to gain admission should note the following MCGILL application deadline 2024

McGill University Admission Requirements 2024 – 2024

The general requirement for admission into the MCGILL is given as follows. To apply for admission, prospective students must meet the criteria given below.

Click here: Mcgill Admission Requirements Into Bachelor’s Degree

In addition to the requirement, prospective students should note admission is competitive, and meeting the minimum requirements does not guarantee admission.

 

Check MCGILL Admission Requirements before Applying

  • Make available your High School Certificate/Diploma/Degree
  • IB Diploma or Certificate is available
  • If you have Quebec College History, make documents available
  • Applying from Ontario High School, make available OUAC Number.
  • Make available your passport number/card for international students
  • Know your program before applying.
  • Be reminded that McGill University receives TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, ACT, and AP test results
  • The new students must get the minimum requirements above to be considered for acceptance.
  • Make your credit card available for payment of all required fees.

Note: getting the minimum admissions requirements does not guarantee your admission.

McGill University Application Fees:

Application fee cost (Canadian Student): $100.00

Application fee cost (International Students): $150.00

How to Apply for MCGILL Admission 2024 – 2024 (Early conditional Admission)

  • Check Mcgill Application Deadlines
  • Choose a Study Program
  • Check eligibility for all programs before applying
  • Submit application online
  • Pay a Non-refundable Application Fee
  • Apply for Entrance Scholarship
  • Submit High School Transcripts

How to Submit MCGILL Admission Application Online 2024 – 2024

  • Go to https://horizon.mcgill.ca/pban1/hzskalog.P_DispAppLogin?p_langue=01
  • Generate your Mcgill University Username/Password.
  • Fill in all necessary information correctly and submit

How to Pay for McGill Admission Application Fee 2024 – 2024

  • Go to https://horizon.mcgill.ca/pban1/hzskalog.P_DispAppLogin?p_langue=01
  • Login with a Login ID and PIN
  • Click payment Link
  • Click the PAY Application Fee button

McGill University (MCGILL) Transcript: How to Submit

To fully complete the MCGILL Admission application, all students are required to submit their High School Transcript to the university for admission authentication. Students from Canadian Provinces should click here https://McGillconnected.McGillegina.ca/apply/highschooltranscripts.ezc

To send High School transcripts to MCGILL for admission authentication, several platforms are open for Canadian Province students. They are;

  •     British Columbia
  •     Alberta
  •     Manitoba
  •     New Brunswick
  •     New Foundland & Labrador
  •     Northwest Territories
  •     Maya Scotia
  •     Nunavut
  •     Ontario
  •     Prince Edward Island
  •     Quebec
  •     Saskatchewan
  •     Yukon

These and many more can be so easy to send High School transcripts to the McGill University for Admission processes.
